description: Nostalgic comparison app where parents/kids enter DOB, app pulls data from when parent was kid's current age. Shows pop culture, news, sports, music, personal photos, diary entries - 'what the world was like when I was your age.'
notes: Features: DOB input, age calculation, historical data APIs (news, music charts, sports scores), photo upload, diary entries, timeline view. Target: parents sharing their childhood with kids through data.
